summary: This retexture mod replaces every glass armor and weapon texture with new ones.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Uwawb.jpg[/img]


[img]http://i.imgur.com/IsTNF.png?1[/img]
Morrowind looking Glass Retexture V2 is out now!

This retexture mod replaces every glass armor and weapon texture with new one and modifies meshes. Textures made from Bethesda\'s HD texture dlc. Won\'t conflict with Chillrend.

I decided to upload this as it\'s own file since I\'ve been worked alot on this mod and now both armor and weapons are included in the same file. 

My previous glass retextures got many downloads and endorsements. I was glad to see that people liked them. Thanks alot for that! 

---
Changelog:
UPDATE 3 (30 October 2012) Added Morrowind looking Glass Retexture V2, with improved normalmaps.
Update 2 (10 August 2012): fixed female helmet_1.nif, no more weird shades.
Update 1: bow won\'t dissapear anymore.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/cMklP.png?1[/img]

put or extract Data folder to common\\skyrim\\

[img]http://i.imgur.com/YzKEI.png?1[/img]

delete: 
MWglass folder from common\\skyrim\\textures\\weapons
MWglass folder from common\\skyrim\\textures\\armor
and
glass folder from common\\skyrim\\Meshes\\armor
glass folder from common\\skyrim\\Meshes\\weapons
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Any bugs or typos in .nif files please tell.

Permission note: 
I won\'t be uploading this file to Steam workshop. That means that noone will. I won\'t be happy if I see that there. I\'m Nexus supporter and have been since 2007.
author: JESSETIN3
